body:
Everybody hates unfair banning. It happened to my friend during a skype call. My friend was banned for flying, criticals, anti knockback, aimbot, bow aimbot, step, and auto respawn. At least 2 of these don't exist. 

1. Criticals are not hacking. You can do that by simply jump hitting someone. 
2. Doesn't know what step even is.
3. Auto respawn: Server does that for eveyone.
4. My friend died from knockback at least twice during the game we were in.
5. My friend only got one bow kill during the game.

I don't know why or how the ban was executed. There were no warnings and no complaints in chat. I think my friend was reported because of a troll, which is why this server's anti hack system is flawed. You simply cannot rely on players to be fair. All I know is that my friend shot a guy off once, got reported by him, and got banned by javipepe. My friend apparently gives up on the server so I made this appeal. I am aiming to lift the ban or at least reduce it to a temp ban. I hope this message reaches staff.

-Nightmarethe5th

When you use criticals, what it does is it makes every single one of your hits criticals. You don't even have to jump.

Your friend can appeal his ban in the "Appeal an Infraction tab."
